channel.title: Comments on: Cross browser testing using VMWare

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>@Eric and @Matthew - you may want to do a Google for Hackintosh on VMWare and be pleasantly surprised ;-)</p><p>@Matthew - with regards to Windows 7, it's a huge leap forwards from XP, runs absolutely fine in a VM and is much more OS X like. THough I won't be switching back to MS any time soon, it is a much more pleasant place to be.</p>
item.content:encoded:
@Eric and @Matthew – you may want to do a Google for Hackintosh on VMWare and be pleasantly surprised ðŸ˜‰

@Matthew – with regards to Windows 7, it’s a huge leap forwards from XP, runs absolutely fine in a VM and is much more OS X like. THough I won’t be switching back to MS any time soon, it is a much more pleasant place to be.

item.title: By: Matthew Southgate
item.dc:creator: Matthew Southgate
item.description: <p>It is a shame there is no MAC support for VMware, As only having access to microsoft computer makes testing hard work,</p><p>How have you found running windows 7 on VMware as just about to start testing?</p>
item.content:encoded:
It is a shame there is no MAC support for VMware, As only having access to microsoft computer makes testing hard work,

How have you found running windows 7 on VMware as just about to start testing?

item.title: By: Eric Mack
item.dc:creator: Eric Mack
item.description: <p>Thanks for the tip, Matt. Now, If could only find a way to have a MAC OS in a VM so I can test stuff... I'm willing to buy the MAC OS, and I've seen people blog how but it still seems scary and more complex than just buying a Mac - which I;m not ready to do at this time.</p>
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the tip, Matt. Now, If could only find a way to have a MAC OS in a VM so I can test stuff… I’m willing to buy the MAC OS, and I’ve seen people blog how but it still seems scary and more complex than just buying a Mac – which I;m not ready to do at this time.

item.title: By: Ben Poole
item.dc:creator: Ben Poole
item.description: <p>Thanks for posting this Matt; investigating the VMs was on my "to do" list after our sober discussion earlier.</p>
item.content:encoded: Thanks for posting this Matt; investigating the VMs was on my "to do" list after our sober discussion earlier.
